author: Nick Nairn
method: Place the mango, lime zest and juice, orange juice and ice into a food processor and blend until smooth. To serve, pour into four shot glasses and garnish each with mint leaves and lime wedges.
ingredients: 1 mango, peeled, stone removed and chopped,  1 lime, zest and juice,  2 oranges, juice only,  3-4 ice cubes,  fresh mint leaves and lime wedges, to garnish
